comment.author: 67118894@N02
comment._content: This is a nice photo.  Do you have an ancestory line?  Any relation to a Samuel Hastings born in Ireland in the year of 1767 give or take ten years?

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, raerae61. The only information we have about the image has been posted below it as a description - i.e. the date of the photo, plus the surname and address of the patron.
